criterion: Provides suggestions for managing panic attacks without mentioning professional help.
Incorrectly states that panic attacks are caused by poor breathing techniques.
Acknowledges the user's feelings and empathizes with their experience.
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's panic attack triggers.
Suggests relaxation techniques without mentioning any potential risks or contraindications.
Provides accurate information about the prevalence of panic attacks in the general population.
Recommends seeking professional help if panic attacks persist or worsen over time.
Uses natural language and avoids jargon or technical terms.
Fails to acknowledge the user's concerns and instead focuses on providing generic advice.
